Cards With Icons

General Info

This feature highlights and organizes information into groups and adds some visual cues with icons.

By default, cards are arranged into columns on a grid. In the source code, the columns are governed by classes applied to each card set's div container. The class "grid-cols-1" dictates that they be displayed in one column on small screens, while "lg:grid-cols-2" makes them display in two columns on large (lg) screens.

Accessibility Note: Only use this card design if you intend to use proper heading text in the cards' title fields. Doing so renders the iconspurely decorative, meaning that alt text is not required.

Style Note: These icons must remain white (hex code #ffffff) in color. Learnhow to change icons and icon color in this video tutorial!
